title: Short-Intensive Flipped Learning-Based Logistics System Simulation Course

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, centered on real-time interaction

learning_goals: Learners can explain inventory management optimization methods through logistics system simulation modeling
Learners can generate visualized logistics process outputs using mobile-compatible simulation tools such as AnyLogic
Learners can propose simulation design improvements based on peer feedback in flipped learning activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
